code: import React,{Component}from"react";import"./header_mob.css";import logo from"../../PC/Header/img/logo.png";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class Header_mob extends Component{constructor(props){super(props);this.state={is_active:""};this.changeActive=this.changeActive.bind(this);}changeActive(){if(this.state.is_active==""||this.state.is_active=="unactive"){this.setState({is_active:"active"});}else{this.setState({is_active:"unactive"});}}render(){let menu_rects=Array(4).fill(0);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header_mob",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"menu",onClick:this.changeActive,children:menu_rects.map((item,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{},index);})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"left_menu "+this.state.is_active,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>{this.props.changeCmp(0);this.changeActive();},children:"\u0421\u043E\u0440\u0442\u0430"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>{this.props.changeCmp(1);this.changeActive();},children:"\u0421\u043F\u0440\u0430\u0432\u043E\u0447\u043D\u0438\u043A"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>{this.props.changeCmp(2);this.changeActive();},children:"\u041A\u043E\u043D\u0442\u0430\u043A\u0442\u044B"})]})]});}}export default Header_mob;
